title: Helium (Premium) - App Sync and Backup v1.1.0.6 by CSK070{AMRG}
description:
INFO- <a href="
http://kickass.to/helium-premium-app-sync-and-backup-v1-1-0-6-csk070-amrg-t7651610.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://kickass.to/helium-premium-app-sync-and-backup-v1-1-0-6-csk070-amrg-t7651610.html</a>

Carbon lets you backup your apps and data to your SD card or cloud storage. With Carbon, you can sync app data from your other Android devices-- even if they are not on the same network. Set up backup schedules with Carbon, and never lose data again.

Carbon Setup

    Install Carbon on Android
        Root user? You're done!
    Install and run Carbon Desktop (link below)
        Windows users must install their Android drivers as well
    Connect Android to computer.
        You may need to set your USB Connection Mode to "PTP". (Nexus 7, Nexus 10, etc)
    Carbon on Android should now be enabled.

Carbon (Free) features:
 Backup and restore to SD card
 Backup and restore from PC

Carbon (Premium) features:

 No ads
 Automatic Backup schedules
 Android to Android sync
 Cloud backup and restore
 Dropbox
 Box
 Google Drive

Note: 
Carbon is NOT available to Motorola devices. This is because Motorola phones have a bug that break Android's backup mechanism. Until this is fixed by Motorola, Carbon will not work on those Androids.

What's in this version : (Updated : Jul 23, 2013)

Carbon has been renamed to "Helium" (trademark issue) App icons are now stored in a .nomedia directory as a hidden dot file. Redo your backups to hopefully clear out the gallery spam. Fixed a bugs with PC Restore. Helium's Windows Installer now includes the Universal ADB Driver as part of the installation. If you had device detection problems before, this may fix it! Cloud backups are now managed separately per device Wifi settings can now be backed up (root required
